setup_guide.step_1: Find your beacon UUIDs using a beacon scanner app (iOS: Locate Beacon, Android: nRF Connect)
setup_guide.step_2: Place beacons at 4 corners of the warehouse (or strategic locations)
setup_guide.step_3: Register each beacon with its floor plan position using the setup page
setup_guide.step_4: Test positioning by walking around with the scanner

beacon_positions_guide.description: Suggested beacon placement for 90ft x 130ft warehouse
